These are estimated populations of historical cities over time. Note that there are several problems with estimating the sizes of individual cities, and the highest estimates for a given city, in a given period, may be several times the lowest. 6,000  50,000             2,000 15,000 15,000 35,000   6,000 1,800 40,000  40,000 60,000       60,000 45,000  40,000      80,000  40,000     25,000 40,000     60,000       60,000 50,000  300,000  50,000  25,000 40,000     25,000 40,000    600,000   50,000 50,000 50,000        100,000    60,000       60,000     50,000 100,000 50,000 100,000 100,000       100,000 100,000   200,000 250,000   80,000   100,000 100,000     1,000,000    700,000  1,000,000  20,000 500,000  90,000   100,000   500,000   300,000   150,000   150,000   84,000   81,000   1,000,000   50,000 60,000 60,000      90,000   175,000   160,000   150,000 150,000 150,000     18,000 40,000 60,000 400,000     200,000  1,000,000   125,000 200,000   125,000 200,000  60,000   70,000   100,000   235,000   280,000   225,000   350,000    200,000   1,000,000   350,000
